DOC.brief_summary: This study is to compare the effects of Betaserc 24mg and placebo on compensation of postural and locomotor deficits (static and dynamic posturography) after vestibular neurotomy in patients suffering from disabling Menière's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Betaserc on Vestibular Compensation in Patients Suffering From Disabling Meniere's Disease and Having Undergone Vestibular Neurotomy
DOC.criteria: Patients who have undergone vestibular neurotomy for the treatment of disabling Menière's disease and who have confirmed vestibular areflexia Other peripheral vestibular disease than Menière’s disease Central vestibular disease Neurological disease Contraindication to betahistine Pregnant or lactating women
